Question: Volkswagen AG CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Volkswagen AG

Product 1
- Volkswagen integrates ChatGPT into its vehicles
- ChatGPT integrated into the IDA voice assistant
- Available in models: ID.7, ID.4, ID.5, ID.3, the all-new Tiguan, the all-new Passat, and the new Golf
- Enabled by Cerence Chat Pro, offering a multitude of new capabilities including voice control, infotainment, navigation, and air conditioning
- Provides additional information through AI, enhancing conversations and providing vehicle-specific information
- Hands-free activation by saying "Hello IDA" or pressing the button on the steering wheel
- ChatGPT does not gain access to vehicle data, ensuring data protection
- Offered as a standard feature from the second quarter of 2024 in many production vehicles

产品1
- 大众汽车将ChatGPT集成到其车辆中
- ChatGPT集成到IDA语音助手中

- 通过Cerence Chat Pro实现的功能，包括语音控制、信息娱乐、导航和空调
- 通过人工智能提供额外的信息，增强对话并提供车辆特定信息

- ChatGPT不会访问车辆数据，确保数据保护
- 从2024年第二季度起，将作为标准功能在许多生产车辆中提供
